cards.name: Bishop
cards.ability: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

cards.name: Captain Carter
cards.ability: Ongoing: Add this card's Power to your back-row cards here. (can't add to itself)

cards.name: Devil Dinosaur
cards.ability: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Dum Dum Dugan
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your front-row cards here have +1 Power. (can't add to itself)

cards.name: Infinity Ultron
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add 2 of <mark>Ultron's Stones</mark> to your hand.

cards.name: Patriot
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your cards with no abilities have +2 Power.

cards.name: Phastos
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give each card in your deck -1 Cost or +2 Power.

cards.name: Redwing
cards.ability: The first time this moves, add a card from your hand to the old location.

cards.name: Rhino
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a <mark>Rock</mark> to your side of this location.

cards.name: Rocket Raccoon and Groot
cards.ability: You can move this once. After your opponent plays a card here, steal 1 Power from it.

cards.name: Sam Wilson Captain America
cards.ability: Game Start: Add <mark>Cap's Shield</mark> to a random location. Ongoing: You can move <mark>Cap's Shield</mark>.

cards.name: Scream
cards.ability: When an enemy card moves, steal 2 Power from it. (once per turn)

cards.name: Sebastian Shaw
cards.ability: When this permanently gains Power, gain +2 more Power. (wherever this is)

cards.name: SP//dr
cards.ability: On Reveal: Merge with one of your cards here. You can move that card next turn.

cards.name: The First Ghost Rider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-Power card from your hand. Remove that card's Power from this.

cards.name: Toxie Doxie
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give 2 cards in your hand +2 Power. You can't play them next turn.

cards.name: Toxin
cards.ability: On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. +2 Power for each returned.

items: Title: My Synthezoid Body is Ready

items.title: Collector's Vault
items: Exclusive variants available again for a limited time!

items.title: High Voltage
items: The ultra fast game mode with three turns and tons of energy returns. Play and unlock Toxie Doxie, for FREE!

items.title: Snap Packs
items: Each guarantee 1 unowned card (no dupes!) and 2 bonus rewards
Token Packs — Purchase Tokens right from the Card Shop with Gold
